content: this easy design gives a modern elegant twist to the beloved traditional granny stitch from beginners to experts the pleasure of this pattern is sure to be experienced by all a great stash buster - you can whip this cowl up in no time this pattern is designed to fit ages two to adult meaning that you can make one for your whole family and the best part is that you can take it with you wherever you go - it s perfect for walking the dogs grocery shopping at the park with the kids or a formal event granny s cowl is a must-have to add to your fall wardrobe it s the perfect versatile accessory for any occasion ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them ❤ size this crochet cardigan pattern is written for 4 sizes 2-4 years 4-10 years teen adult ❤ materials i used less than one skein of lion brand mandala for my adult version you will need between 150 and 230 yards depending on the size you are making 4mm hook stitch markers optional scissors tapestry needle
